text:
My sister hadn’t seen one set of children & grandchildren in well over a year. This is her yesterday after landing in Dallas, thanks to @Pfizer @ArmoryNYC @NYPHospital @ColumbiaDoctors @WeillCornell. 

Get #vaccinated!!! 

#vaccine #vaccines #COVID19
